sentence.Network_cn: 这种情节确实让人难以置信。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to practice upon the imagination and credulity of the public.
sentence.Network_cn: 他企图利用群众的空想和轻信.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... credo 信条 credulity 轻信 creophagism 肉食.
1. credulouscredulity 易信,轻信creed 信条

list.abs: want credulous ad in cure , hospital of choice distinctive specialized subject makes effective treatment !在治疗中不要轻信广告，选择有特色的专科医院做有效治疗！
even as the dot-com bubbledeflated , credulous bankers and investors began inflating a new bubble in housing .还在互联网泡沫破裂时，轻信的银行家和投资人开始在房地产方面制造新的泡沫。
1046 . Only a credulous person would fall for that old trick ., 只有轻信的人才会被那个陈旧的骗局骗倒 . 无心 1995.
and yet their pitch was convincing precisely because they could explain the nuances of wedding registries to credulous men .但正是由于她们能把网上结婚礼品店的微妙之处向轻信的男人解释清楚，她们的推销才有说服力。

entry.def: Credulity is a willingness to believe that something is real or true.

example.tran: 这种情节确实让人难以置信。

auth_sentence.content: Misplaced credulity isn't much better than misplaced incredulity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Misplaced credulity isn't much better than misplaced incredulity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Misplaced credulity isn't much better than misplaced incredulity.

auth_sentence.content: That ocschwar wants to stretch for other utterly implausible explanations defies credulity.
auth_sentence.res_content: That ocschwar wants to stretch for other utterly implausible explanations defies credulity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That ocschwar wants to stretch for other utterly implausible explanations defies credulity.

auth_sentence.content: Why is it that you people swallow crude propaganda with such credulity?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why is it that you people swallow crude propaganda with such credulity?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why is it that you people swallow crude propaganda with such credulity?

stems_affixes.word_buile: cred相信+ible能……的→adj.可靠的,可信的
cred相信,信任+ulous多……的→相信太多→轻信的
in不+credulous[adj.轻信的,易信的]→adj.怀疑的, 不轻信的
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
cred相信,信任+ential表形容词或名词→让人相信的东西→凭据
credulous[[adj.轻信的,易信的]]→n.易信, 轻信
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
ac给予+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→给予相信→委托
dis不+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→v.不信任,怀疑
